description: The Global Coastal Transect Repository (GCTR) consists of ~11.5 million transects (GCTS) with a diverse array of coastal features. These features include intersection distances to the OpenStreetMap coastline at bearings ranging from 0 to 360 degrees; and data from ERA5 and Overture sources. Each transect extends 2000 meters, originating from a generalized OpenStreetMap coastline (as of 2023-02-09) at a zoom level of 9. Transects are positioned at regular intervals of 100 meters, providing a consistent alongshore resolution.

data.title: GCTR
data.description: Parquet dataset with coastal transects (2000 m), at 100 m alongshore resolution, with a wide range of coastal characteristics.

table:columns.name: tr_name
table:columns.description: A unique identifier for each transect, constructed from three key components: the 'coastline_id', 'segment_id', and 'interpolated_distance'. The 'coastline_id' corresponds to the FID in OpenStreetMap (OSM) and is prefixed with 'cl'. The 'segment_id' indicates the segment of the OSM coastline split by a UTM grid, prefixed with 's'. The 'interpolated_distance' represents the distance from the starting point of the coastline to the transect, interpolated along the segment, and is prefixed with 'tr'. The complete structure is 'cl[coastline_id]s[segment_id]tr[interpolated_distance]', exemplified by 'cl32946s04tr08168547'. This composition ensures each transect name is a distinct and informative representation of its geographical and spatial attributes.

table:columns.name: lon
table:columns.description: Longitude of the transect starting point.

table:columns.name: lat
table:columns.description: Latitude of the transect starting point.

table:columns.name: bearing
table:columns.description: North bearing of the transect from the landward side in degrees, with north as the reference.

table:columns.name: geometry
table:columns.description: Well-Known Binary (WKB) representation of the transect as a linestring geometry.

table:columns.name: coastline_is_closed
table:columns.description: Indicates whether the source OpenStreetMap (OSM) coastline, from which the transects were derived, forms a closed loop. A value of 'true' suggests that the coastline represents an enclosed area, such as an island.

table:columns.name: coastline_length
table:columns.description: Represents the total length of the source OpenStreetMap (OSM) coastline, that is summed across various UTM regions. It reflects the aggregate length of the original coastline from which the transects are derived.

table:columns.name: utm_crs
table:columns.description: EPSG code representing the UTM Coordinate Reference System for the transect.

table:columns.name: bbox
table:columns.type: struct<minx: double, miny: double, maxx: double, maxy: double>
table:columns.description: Bounding box of the transect geometry, given by minimum and maximum coordinates in x (longitude) and y (latitude).

table:columns.name: quadkey
table:columns.description: QuadKey corresponding to the transect origin location at zoom 12, following the Bing Maps Tile System for spatial indexing.

table:columns.name: country
table:columns.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code representing the country in which the transect is located.

table:columns.name: common_country_name
table:columns.description: The commonly used name of the country where the transect is located.

table:columns.name: country_wikidata
table:columns.description: Wikidata identifier for the country, providing a unique reference to the structured data entry for the country in the Wikidata database.

table:columns.name: continent
table:columns.description: The name of the continent on which the transect is located, providing a higher-level geographical classification of the transect's location.

table:columns.name: dist_b0
table:columns.description: Distance from the transect start to the nearest OpenStreetMap coastline intersection using a 0-degree bearing defined from the transect.

table:columns.name: dist_b30
table:columns.description: Distance from the transect start to the intersection with the 30-degree bearing line from the nearest coastline point.

table:columns.name: dist_b60
table:columns.description: Distance from the transect start to the intersection with the 60-degree bearing line from the nearest coastline point.

table:columns.name: dist_b90
table:columns.description: Distance from the transect start to the intersection with the 90-degree bearing line from the nearest coastline point.

table:columns.name: dist_b120
table:columns.description: Distance from the transect start to the intersection with the 120-degree bearing line from the nearest coastline point.

table:columns.name: dist_b150
table:columns.description: Distance from the transect start to the intersection with the 150-degree bearing line from the nearest coastline point.

table:columns.name: dist_b180
table:columns.description: Distance from the transect start to the intersection with the 180-degree bearing line from the nearest coastline point.

table:columns.name: dist_b210
table:columns.description: Distance from the transect start to the intersection with the 210-degree bearing line from the nearest coastline point.

table:columns.name: dist_b240
table:columns.description: Distance from the transect start to the intersection with the 240-degree bearing line from the nearest coastline point.

table:columns.name: dist_b270
table:columns.description: Distance from the transect start to the intersection with the 270-degree bearing line from the nearest coastline point.

table:columns.name: dist_b300
table:columns.description: Distance from the transect start to the intersection with the 300-degree bearing line from the nearest coastline point.

table:columns.name: dist_b330
table:columns.description: Distance from the transect start to the intersection with the 330-degree bearing line from the nearest coastline point.

table:columns.name: vhm0_jan_mar
table:columns.description: Average significant wave height (Hm0) for the January to March period, recorded at the transect.

table:columns.name: vhm0_apr_jun
table:columns.description: Average significant wave height (Hm0) for the April to June period, recorded at the transect.

table:columns.name: vhm0_jul_sep
table:columns.description: Average significant wave height (Hm0) for the July to September period, recorded at the transect.

table:columns.name: vhm0_oct_dec
table:columns.description: Average significant wave height (Hm0) for the October to December period, recorded at the transect.

table:columns.name: vtm02_jan_mar
table:columns.description: Average wave period (Tm02) for the January to March period, recorded at the transect.

table:columns.name: vtm02_apr_jun
table:columns.description: Average wave period (Tm02) for the April to June period, recorded at the transect.

table:columns.name: vtm02_jul_sep
table:columns.description: Average wave period (Tm02) for the July to September period, recorded at the transect.

table:columns.name: vtm02_oct_dec
table:columns.description: Average wave period (Tm02) for the October to December period, recorded at the transect.

sci:citation: Calkoen, et al.2024, Enabling Coastal Analytics at Broad Spatial Scales, in progress.
title: Global Coastal Transect Repository (GCTR)

geoparquet-stac-items.title: GeoParquet STAC items
geoparquet-stac-items.description: Snapshot of the collection's STAC items exported to GeoParquet format.
